entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tulita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tulita Airport 03:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -33.2°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -36.4°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
